action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Ari's Law - Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to revise the definition of "firearm" to include the barrel, stock, and any part of the action of any weapon that will, is designed to, or may readily be converted to, expel a projectile by the action of an explosive.
